trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of the Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA) must inherit.
trans-unit.target: 表示的數位簽章演算法 (DSA) 中的所有實作必須從它都繼承的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: You can use the DSA class and derived classes to create digital signatures that help protect the integrity of your data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 DSA 類別和衍生的類別來建立數位簽章，協助您保護資料的完整性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> provides an implementation of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>提供此類別的實作</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用公開金鑰系統以數位方式簽署訊息，寄件者先套用雜湊函式來建立訊息摘要。

trans-unit.source: The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature.
trans-unit.target: 寄件者接著會使用寄件者的私密金鑰來建立個人簽章寄件者的加密訊息摘要。

trans-unit.source: Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used.
trans-unit.target: 在收到訊息和簽章，接收者會使用寄件者的公開金鑰來復原訊息摘要簽章，並使用雜湊訊息寄件者使用的相同雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can assume that the message was not altered while in transit.
trans-unit.target: 如果接收者計算完全相符的訊息摘要寄件者收到的訊息摘要，接收者就可以假設訊息在傳輸過程中沒有遭到竄改。

trans-unit.source: Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，可以驗證簽章的任何人，因為寄件者的公開金鑰是通用資訊。

trans-unit.source: Newer asymmetric algorithms are available.
trans-unit.target: 使用較新的非對稱演算法。

trans-unit.source: Consider using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> class, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa> class, or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman> class instead of the DSA class.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>類別、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa>類別或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman>類別，而不是 DSA 類別。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: Use DSA only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.
trans-unit.target: DSA 只能用於與舊版應用程式和資料的相容性。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: 這個演算法在 64 位元為增量來支援 1024 位元到 512 位元的金鑰長度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 建立用來執行非對稱演算法的預設密碼編譯物件。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 用來執行非對稱演算法的密碼編譯物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定用來執行非對稱演算法的密碼編譯物件。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>, use the name System.Security.Cryptography.DSA.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>，使用名稱 System.Security.Cryptography.DSA。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: 名稱的特定實作<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 用來執行非對稱演算法的密碼編譯物件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會建立<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>簽章，以指定的資料。

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 要簽署的資料。

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料的數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, exports the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSAParameters"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會將匯出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSAParameters"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include private parameters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包含私用參數;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The parameters for <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 參數<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> object from an XML string.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>從 XML 字串的物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML string to use to reconstruct the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要用來重新建構的 XML 字串<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The xmlString parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The xmlString parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The format of the xmlString parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 格式 xmlString 參數無效。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, computes the hash value of a specified binary stream by using a specified hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，請使用指定的雜湊演算法計算指定的二進位資料流的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The binary stream to hash.
trans-unit.target: 要雜湊的二進位資料流。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm to use to hash the data.
trans-unit.target: 要用來雜湊資料的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The hashed data.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊的資料。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, computes the hash value of a specified portion of a byte array by using a specified hashing algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，請使用指定的雜湊演算法計算雜湊值的位元組陣列中的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The data to be hashed.
trans-unit.target: 要雜湊的資料。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first byte in `data` that is to be hashed.
trans-unit.target: 中的第一個位元組索引`data`要雜湊。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to hash.
trans-unit.target: 要雜湊的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm to use to hash the data.
trans-unit.target: 要用來雜湊資料的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The hashed data.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊的資料。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，匯入指定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSAParameters"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 參數<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that a digital signature is valid by calculating the hash value of the specified data using the specified hash algorithm and comparing it to the provided signature.
trans-unit.target: 驗證數位簽章是否有效，計算指定的資料，使用指定的雜湊值的雜湊演算法和比較，來提供的簽章。

trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的資料。

trans-unit.target: 要驗證的簽章資料。

trans-unit.target: 用來建立資料的雜湊值的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>數位簽章是否有效。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 使用資料的雜湊簽署`rgbSignature`。
